ModMetaData.name: Research Tree (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Fluffy,Mlie,Baiyin
ModMetaData.description: 1.Fixed an issue where using it alongside the Organized Research Tab (Continued) would cause two research tabs to appear. 2.Optimized the speed of generating the research tree, significantly improving generation speed in scenarios with multiple mods. 3.Improved the responsiveness of dragging (including mouse and WASD) and zooming, making operations more immediate and smoother. 4.Added a feature to hide completed projects.
